queries.received: project = SS AND (처리부서 = 개발6팀 OR assignee in membersOf(개발6팀) ) AND duedate > 2026-01-01 ORDER BY createdDate ASC
queries.inProgress: project = SS AND (처리부서 = 개발6팀 OR assignee in membersOf(개발6팀) ) AND status != Closed AND duedate > 2026-01-01 ORDER BY createdDate ASC
queries.delayed: project = SS AND (처리부서 = 개발6팀 OR assignee in membersOf(개발6팀) ) AND status != Closed AND due < now() AND duedate > 2026-01-01 ORDER BY createdDate ASC
queries.total: project = SS AND (처리부서 = 개발6팀 OR assignee in membersOf(개발6팀) ) AND (status = Closed) AND duedate > 2026-01-01 ORDER BY createdDate ASC
